name: LIFX Buildkite Build Light
description: An example Ruby Buildkite webhook endpoint for creating a LIFX-powered build light

BULB_SELECTOR.description: A LIFX API build selector to choose which bulbs to turn on (see http://api.lifx.com/ for examples)

PROJECT_NAME.description: The name of the Buildkite project whose builds you want to trigger the light.

BRANCH_NAME.description: The name of the branch that should trigger the light.

LIFX_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: A LIFX personal access token (create one at http://cloud.lifx.com/)

WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: The Buildkite webhook token. Let Heroku generate this for you, copy it from the Heroku appâ€™s config variables, and then paste it into Buildkite when you setup the webhook.
